entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince Rupert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:21 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 06:00 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 41 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -16.5°C
Wind: N 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near mainland valleys and inlets. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near mainland valleys and inlets. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near mainland valleys and inlets in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
